mapper.insert: insert into final_cart_tb (cart_no, user_no, class_no) values (cart_no_seq.nextval,#{userNo},#{classNo})
mapper.select: select A.class_no as classNo ,A.class_title as classTitle ,A.class_period as period ,A.class_price as price ,A.class_discountprice as discountPrice ,A.class_image as img ,B.cart_no as cartNo from final_class_tb A, final_cart_tb B where A.class_no = B.class_no and user_no = #{value}
